com.plexobject.service

Class ServiceRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.plexobject.service.ServiceRegistry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IncomingInterceptorsLifecycle, InterceptorsLifecycle, Lifecycle, OutgoingInterceptorsLifecycle, ServiceContainer, ServiceRegistryMBean

    public class ServiceRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
implements ServiceContainer, InterceptorsLifecycle, ServiceRegistryMBean
    This class defines registry for service handlers
